Class DataCollection<T>

java.lang.Object
utils.DataCollection<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
IdentifiableCollection, TransactionRecordCollection, UserCollection
public abstract class DataCollection<T> extends Object

      public List<T> getData()
      get a list contains every item of the collection
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      clear the collection, removing all of its data

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      verify if the collection is empty
      Returns:
      true if the collection is empty and false if there is some item in it

      public void sort(Comparator<T> comparator)

      Parameters:

    • filter

      public List<T> filter(Predicate<T> predicate)
      get a list that contains the filtered elements of the collection
      Parameters:
      predicate - test if the item should be kept or not
      Returns:
      a list of all the items which the predicate was true

    • save

      public void save() throws UtilException
      save the collection into a serialize file
      Throws:
      UtilException - occurs when the file manager is not able to serialize the data for reason like file not found or IO exception

      public void load()
      load the data from a serialized file
